mapper.select:
select t1.id , t1.rule_code , t1.rule_name_ch , t1.rule_name_en , t1.sequence , t1.rule_conf_type , t1.pre_brackets , t1.condition_attr_en , t1.condition_attr_ch , t1.arithmetic_operator , t1.operator , t1.compare_value_en , t1.compare_value_ch , t1.after_brackets , t1.logical_operator , t1.manual_rule , t1.compilation_result , t1.version_num , t1.new_version_is_update from sys_rule_when_config t1 where validate_state = 1
and t1.RULE_CODE like #{dto.ruleCode}||'___'
order by t1.sequence

select t1.id , t1.rule_code , t1.rule_name_ch , t1.rule_name_en , t1.sequence , t1.rule_conf_type , t1.pre_brackets , t1.condition_attr_en , t1.condition_attr_ch , t1.arithmetic_operator , t1.operator , t1.compare_value_en , t1.compare_value_ch , t1.after_brackets , t1.logical_operator , t1.manual_rule , t1.compilation_result , t1.version_num , t1.new_version_is_update , from sys_rule_when_config t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from sys_rule_when_config t1 where t1.rule_code like #{ids}||'___'
